sentences.en: At first it was but a lurid spark upon the stone pavement.
sentences.cn: 起先,那只是闪现在石板路上的灰黄色的星星之火.

sentences.en: He told me in lurid detail what would happen to me.
sentences.cn: 他把我将会遇到的可怕事情详详细细地告诉了我。

sentences.en: His hatred of you burns with a lurid flame - the flame that never dies.
sentences.cn: 他对你的仇恨象熊熊燃烧的火焰 -- 永不熄灭的火焰.

sentences.en: His revelations of financial corruption were lurid and highly exaggerated, but they had a tremendous impact.
sentences.cn: 他对金融界腐化的揭发是过分渲染和高度夸张的, 但确曾产生巨大影响.

sentences.en: His revelations of financial corruption were lurid and highly exaggerated.
sentences.cn: 他对金融界腐化的揭发是过份渲染和高度夸张的.

sentences.en: Jack London's is the better novel in being rather less lurid and rather more consistently grim.
sentences.cn: 杰克·伦敦的那一部略胜一筹,因为它所描写的凶兆大致上顺理成章,而且不那样悲惨.

sentences.en: Like spilt quicksilver, hoarse growls rolled over the lurid weeds like thunders.
sentences.cn: 低沉嘶哑的吼声像散落的水银滚过红色的草.

sentences.en: She gave us a lurid description of the birth.
sentences.cn: 关于分娩,她向我们做了令人毛骨悚然的描述.

sentences.en: She took care to paint her toe nails a lurid red or orange.
sentences.cn: 她精心地把脚指甲涂成妖艳的红色或橙色。

sentences.en: She was wearing a lurid orange and green blouse.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件花哨的橙绿相间的衬衫.

sentences.en: Some reports have contained lurid accounts of deaths and mutilations.
sentences.cn: 一些报道含有对死状和肢解的令人毛骨悚然的描述。

sentences.en: The King had been putting about lurid rumours for months.
sentences.cn: 国王连续数月都在散布骇人听闻的谣言。

sentences.en: The lurid sunset puts a red light on their faces.
sentences.cn: 血红一般的夕阳映红了他们的脸.

sentences.en: The paper gave all the lurid details of the murder.
sentences.cn: 这份报纸对这起凶杀案骇人听闻的细节描述得淋漓尽致。

sentences.en: The paper gave all the lurid details of the murder.
sentences.cn: 这份报纸对这起凶杀案耸人听闻的细节描写得淋漓尽致.

sentences.en: There was a lurid, gloomy canopy above ; the elm - trees drooped their heavy blackish green.
sentences.cn: 上面是一片苍白又阴郁的苍穹; 榆树枝叶郁郁苍苍地低垂下来.

words.tran_cn: 色彩斑斓地；骇人听闻地；大肆渲染地

trans.tran_en: a description, story etc that is lurid is deliberately shocking and involves sex or violence
